Articles.Content: ye but the patcher is going strong, and very quick

What size is the finished download? I think I've just had it screw up on me. Was so close, then it suddenly finished suspiciously quickly.

just relax and download it later

I'm not an admin on my computer, that won't work.

Steam showed it as a 77.4 MB download on my Mac. It was downloaded and ready to play in a minute or two. I've already conducted my first science mission (a survey of the launch pad and a suborbital flight with Jeb at the controls) and begun unlocking the tech tree. This is a ridiculous amount of fun trying to do real flights with so few parts.

Patcher seems to work. Just copy your previous install to another folder and use it.

Stupid store download crashed at 80-85%... Maybe Squad should not give release dates out so everyone is not starting download at the same time and crashing their serverrs.

Patcher seems to work. Just copy your previous install to another folder and use it.

Can't run the patcher standalone without IT approval at work (even though I am using it in my classroom to educate my students) and there are no IT people on campus ATM. No worries though; it'll be downloaded onto my personal laptop tonight.

Im looking at all these complaints of download speed and Im just sitting here twiddling my thumbs as steam updates it at 2Mb/s.

You have my sympathies, I know that feel.

Thanks, UbioZur, for your responses.
